sentence.Network_en: They differ somewhat from bathymetric charts which are virtually topographic maps of the ocean floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们与水深图稍有不同,后者实际上是洋底地形图.

sentence.Network_en: In bathymetric survey, the recorded seabed is distorted due to the beam - width of the echo sounder.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要在海底地形测量中, 由于波束角效应导致探测的海底地形存在失真.
